existing_features.title: Create a new frontend scaffold component file intended for user extensions, with clear TODO markers and a minimal placeholder UI, and export it for use elsewhere in the app.
Add the new frontend scaffold component into an existing screen so it is visible in the running app (without disrupting existing control panel behavior).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a new section/scaffold in the codebase for the user to implement the remaining functionality
Add a clearly labeled backend scaffold section in backend/main.mo for future user-defined logic, implemented as at least one harmless placeholder query or shared method returning a static value.

projectName: Add a dedicated scaffold section for user custom code (frontend + backend)
